title: Time Act 1997 with the addition, where a public holiday falls on a Sunday, of
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Taxi Regulation (Maximum Fares)
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Taxi Regulation (Maximum Fares) 

Order 2022.
text_norm: 1 order may cited taxi regulation (maximum fares) order 2022

title: Time Act 1997 with the addition, where a public holiday falls on a Sunday, of
heading: 2. This Order shall come into operation on 01 September 2022.
text_raw: 2. This Order shall come into operation on 01 September 2022.
text_norm: 2 order shall come operation 01 september 2022

title: Time Act 1997 with the addition, where a public holiday falls on a Sunday, of
heading: In this Order “public holiday” has the same meaning as it has in
text_raw:
3. 

In this Order “public holiday” has the same meaning as it has in 
paragraphs 1 and 2 of the Second Schedule to the Organisation of Working 
Time Act 1997 with the addition, where a public holiday falls on a Sunday, of 
the following weekday.
text_norm: 3 order public holiday meaning paragraph 1 2 second schedule organisation working time act 1997 addition public holiday fall sunday following weekday

title: Time Act 1997 with the addition, where a public holiday falls on a Sunday, of
heading: 4. The fares contained in the Schedule are fixed as the maximum fares and
text_raw:
4. The fares contained in the Schedule are fixed as the maximum fares and 
charges that may be charged by the driver of a taxi in respect of a journey 
undertaken in the State. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 21st June, 2022 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [293] 3
text_norm: 4 fare contained schedule fixed maximum fare charge may charged driver taxi respect journey undertaken state notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 21st june 2022 293 3

title: Time Act 1997 with the addition, where a public holiday falls on a Sunday, of
heading: Standard Rate: To be displayed in the Rate/Tariff Window as 1
text_raw:
SCHEDULE 

Standard Rate: To be displayed in the Rate/Tariff Window as 1 

Applies 08.00 hours to 20.00 hours, Monday to Saturday 

Changeover Speed (at all times)

title: Time Act 1997 with the addition, where a public holiday falls on a Sunday, of
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Order sets the maximum fares that may be charged by the driver of a taxi 
in respect of a journey undertaken in the State in line with the table contained 
in the Schedule to the Order. 

 
 
 
 
 
 8 [293]
